text: int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , i , j , n , max , x , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; max = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { j = 0 ; x = a [ i ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] + a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; if ( x > max ) max = x ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } }
